# hasRotationRate

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the controller provides rotation data.

## Declaration

```swift
var hasRotationRate: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the controller provides rotation data; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Related Documentation

- **rotationRate**: The rotation rate of the controller.

## Verifying Capabilities

- **hasAttitude**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the controller provides attitude data.
- **hasGravityAndUserAcceleration**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the controller provides gravity and user acceleration data.
- **hasAttitudeAndRotationRate**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the controller provides attitude and rotation data.
